Plot: C.S. Lewis, a world-renowned Christian theologian, writer and professor, leads a passionless life until he meets a spirited poet from the U.S.
Title: Shadowlands
Actors: Julian Fellowes, Roddy Maude-Roxby, Michael Denison, Andrew Seear
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 11 nominations.
